messages.content:
I need to write an email.
The email should be concise.
Respond in the following format:
[initial salutation and/or Recipient's Name, this part can be omitted]

[Body of the email]

[Salutation]
[Writer's name, without the mail signature]
I am MOCK_USER_NAME.
Schreib den Partnern, dass ich k√ºndige, auf Deutsch.
